str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To fawn upon, flatter, beguile; pass: To be perturbed. Akin to seio; to wag, i.e. to shake.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation. From thlibo; pressure.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To lie, recline, be placed, be laid, set, specially appointed, destined. Middle voice of a primary verb; to lie outstretched.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
